metadata.title: CVE-2018-17434 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A SIGFPE signal is raised in the function apply_filters() of h5repack_filters.c in the HDF HDF5 through 1.10.3 library during an attempted parse of a crafted HDF file, because of incorrect protection against division by zero. It could allow a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
